column5: This is one of the best and official summaries of what you can bring into Canada as a visitor. Notes alcohol, tobacco, food and many other things including radios etc. Excellent document to have in you file.http://cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/publications/pub/bsf5082-eng.pdf I think it will answer all you questions on the topic. One thing I was looking for is the restriction on potatoes and they remain prohibited. Paul
